CustomField.description: To calculate Case age duration open in days and hours
CustomField.formula: IF( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )) < 24, TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate)*24,24))) & "h" , TEXT( FLOOR(NOW()- CreatedDate)) & "d " & TEXT( FLOOR(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate)*24,24))) & "h" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To calculate Case age duration open in days and hours
CustomField.label: Duration Open
